search.query: sourcetype=ziften:zenith:alert feed="nvd"|stats first(imagefilepath) as "Sample Path" first(details) as details dc(agentguid) as "Unique MD5 Prev" count as "Gross MD5 Count" min(_time) as "First Seen" max(_time) as "Last Seen" by imagefilemd5|lookup image_info imagefilemd5|sort -"Unique MD5 Prev" |convert ctime("First Seen") ctime("Last Seen")|makemv delim="," details|eval "CVE Count"=mvcount(details)| fields imagefilemd5 "CVE Count" "Sample Path" companyname fileversion productversion "Unique MD5 Prev" "Gross MD5 Count" "First Seen" "Last Seen"

sourcetype=ziften:zenith:alert feed="nvd" |where imagefilemd5="$md5$" |makemv delim="," details |stats first(imagefilepath) as "Sample Path" values(details) as "CVEs" values(accountname) as "Seen User Associations" by agentguid |lookup system_info agentguid|fields computername "Sample Path" "CVEs" agentguid
